title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on Aaron's Issues, Cowboys/Bucs Line, Cardinals Red Flags
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Nick Wright on Aaron's Issues, Cowboys/Bucs Line, Cardinals Red Flags
description:
Colin starts off by defending Dana White's often criticized business model, and explains why the Steelers should ignore Big Ben when it comes to paying TJ Watt (1:00). Then, FS1's First Things First co-host Nick Wright and Colin discuss which future Hall of Fame QB - not named Tom Brady - is the best career comp for Aaron Rodgers (13:00), why Rodgers might be sick of living in Green Bay (18:00), if Tampa can cover as sizeable favorites against the Cowboys in the season opener (34:00), if Cam Newton has an NFL future (39:00), what winning trait Kyler Murray and Kliff Kingsbury both lack in Arizona (49:00), the latest updates from Nick's 2nd job as a high stakes poker player (54:00), and Nick's two NFL sleeper teams that no one is giving a shot (59:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
